sentences.sentence: First, second, third, fourth and so on. We call them ordinals.
sentences.translation: 第一，第二，第三，第四等等。我们称之为序数。

sentences.sentence: And, like arrays, collections use integer-ordinals to obtain particular items.
sentences.translation: 与数组一样，集合使用整序数获取特定项。

sentences.sentence: Creates a new column mapping, using column ordinals to refer to source and destination columns.
sentences.translation: 创建新的列映射，并使用列序号引用源列和目标列。
